metadata.name: mystery egg
metadata.description:
[i]"Sacrificial insemination"[/i]
Adds a brand new follower to the Treasure Room pool!
When Isaac takes damage, Mystery Egg breaks and releases a charmed enemy. The type of enemy spawned depends on how many rooms have been cleared with the familiar (see below).
Spawned monsters have more health than normal.
Synergizes with BFFS!: spawned enemies turn into a random champion type.
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1163138153]Now part of StrawPack 2![/url]
Art by Aczom and code by Strawrat.
[h1]List of possible charmed enemies:[/h1]
[olist]
[*]Level 0: 0 to 1 rooms cleared (inclusive):
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bVt1efu.png[/IMG]
[*]Level 1: 2 to 4 rooms cleared (inclusive):
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rdrbbR6.png[/IMG]
[*]Level 2: 5 to 7 rooms cleared (inclusive):
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0JwTfeB.png[/IMG]
[*]Level 3: 8 to 10 rooms cleared (inclusive):
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fShjRSP.png[/IMG]
[*]Level 4: 11 to 13 rooms cleared (inclusive):
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bl95qV9.png[/IMG]
[*]Level 5: more than 13 rooms cleared:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qzJW7MV.png[/IMG]
[/olist]
[u]Note:[/u] some monsters can turn into other variants, e.g: Mulligans -> Mulligoon, Mulliboom, meaning the list is slightly longer than the one above.
